Package com.Group1

Class BinaryTree<E>

java.lang.Object
com.Group1.BinaryTree<E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BinarySearchTree
public class BinaryTree<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Class for a binary tree that stores type E objects.
See Also:
Serialized Form

      Returns:

    • readBinaryTree

      public static BinaryTree<java.lang.String> readBinaryTree​(java.io.BufferedReader bR) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to read a binary tree. pre: The input consists of a preorder traversal of the binary tree. The line "null" indicates a null tree.
      Parameters:
      bR - The input file
      Returns:
      The binary tree
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an input error
